Container.Name: binhex-nicotineplus
Container.Overview: Nicotine+ is a graphical client for the Soulseek peer-to-peer network. Nicotine+ aims to be a lightweight, pleasant, free and open source (FOSS) alternative to the official Soulseek client, while also providing a comprehensive set of features.Nicotine+ is written in Python and uses GTK for its graphical user interface.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: VNC
Config.Description: Specify the port to use when connecting using a VNC client.

Config.Name: Port: NoVNC (Web Interface)
Config.Description: Specify the port to use when connecting using a web browser.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: This is the container path to your downloaded files or user created content.

Config.Name: Path: /media
Config.Description: This is the container path to your media files, e.g. movies, tv, music, pictures etc.

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPS_CERT_PATH
Config.Description: Specify the path to the HTTPS certificate file

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPS_KEY_PATH
Config.Description: Specify the path to the HTTPS key file

Config.Name: Variable: WEBPAGE_TITLE
Config.Description: Specify the web title shown for the webpage

Config.Name: Variable: VNC_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Specify the password for the VNC interface

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_STARTUP_SCRIPTS
Config.Description: Specify whether to run a script located in '/config/home/scripts/' on startup

Config.Name: Variable: GLUETUN_INCOMING_PORT
Config.Description: Specify whether to attempt to identify and configure the applications listening port when connected to the gluetun network.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_PORT
Config.Description: Specify the port the application will listen on - IMPORTANT: If you change this value then you will also need to delete and re-create the port mapping to match.

Config.Name: Variable: DEBUG
Config.Description: Specify whether you want to enable debug logging, useful when diagnosing gluetune related issues.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
